sentences.en: ‘But … but … I can’t believe … how could you?’ she spluttered.
sentences.cn: “可……可是……我不能相信……你怎么可以？”她语无伦次地说。

sentences.en: He gave a brief splutter of laughter.
I ask as I splutter into a tissue.
sentences.cn: 我一边拿纸巾擤鼻涕一边问他.

sentences.en: The rain caused the lamp to splutter.
The young man was so anxious that he could only splutter out what he had witnessed.
sentences.cn: 那年轻人太急切了,对他亲眼目睹的情况讲得语无伦次,含糊不清.

words.tran_cn: 劈啪声；急忙说出的话；杂乱的声音

trans.tran_en: to talk quickly in short confused phrases, especially because you are angry or surprised

trans.tran_cn: 发劈啪的声音，结结巴巴
发出嘶嘶声，作噼啪声，发爆裂声，语无伦次地说
